# getAddress

Retrieves the address of the current user by calling the `whoami` method on `this.inner`.

## Import

```ts
import { BaseAlchemySigner } from "@account-kit/signer";
```

## Returns

`Promise<string>`
A promise that resolves to the address of the current user.
